attributes.action: Run the pertition created by Stan Sessions titled: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Publish a list of all existing quangos
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Run the pertition created by Stan Sessions titled: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to Publish a list of all existing quangos, the total cost of these, what are their respective remits, what benefits are obtained which the vaious Government Departments cannot achieve without the quangos, and how can the cost effectiveness be established. More details

Submitted by Stan Sessions
